column2: "I see that if I approach from outside your vision you can't notice me."
"I still don't know all of your abilities, but I'm a little closer to understanding."
"If I need to talk to you, I'll come find you."
"I would prefer it if you wouldn't talk to me from your end."
"Have you found the location of the violent Dragonkin Hadred?"
"Your senses at finding other people are extremely good and yet you can't sense his presence."
"Sorry, it seems I got ahead of myself."
"Why are you interested in that dragon?"
"Hadred is especially strong, violent and above all a traitor."
"Traitors cannot not be forgiven. This is the one iron law of our organization."
"If you find where he is, please contact me."
